index.name: Lexy Spry
index.bio: I connect people with information, and I’m very fond of both. I’m a librarian at heart, and keep the values of librarianship top-of-mind whether designing learning experiences or leading a workshop. When I’m not working, I’m either knitting with friends or spending with my family. We build with legos, rides bikes, and tend to our garden.
index.title: Lexy Spry | Speakers | MKE DOT NET 2017
